Question
========
  
What is not the purpose of a factor analysis?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Validation of the questionnaire
* Data reduction
* Establish dimensionality of the questionnaire
* Establish consistency of the scales


Solution
========
  
Establishing consistency of scales is not a goal of factor analysis.
